whatIsMessageContent: So what is Message??? More info needed...
signature: A personal identifier to accompany your transaction
whatIsSpeedOfTX: This field regulates speed of transaction, which is always paid in ETH.  We recommend having at least .01 ETH before making transactions.
password: This password encrypts your private key. This does not act as a seed to generate your keys.
nonce: This refers to the number of the transaction you are making. If you have never made a transaction before, this will be 0. Add +1 for each transaction you make. Reference an ETH blockchain explorer if you do not know your current nonce.
gasLimit: This refers to the maximum allowance of gas you will give for a transaction. All excess gas will be refunded from successful transactions.  This field should autogenerate based on network congestion.
